attributes.action: To Secede England from all Unions, European & National, Dissolve the Government & Monarchy, & reinstate the Magna Carta
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of England believe that Elite special interest groups, Banking Cartels, Oil Companies & Secret Occult societies, have infiltrated every branch of Government & Monarchy to push England in a direction of their choosing against the will of the People, with the goal of creating a One World Government, disolving individual countries soverenties & using technology such as RFID to enslave the People to serve them through a system of survielance, reliance & debt.
To resolve this, our only option is to Secede from all Unions, European & National, Dissolve the Government & Monarchy, forgive & default on all debt, Dissolve the bank of England & replace the current Pound with one that is backed by a gold standard, Reinstate the Magna Carta & re-write all laws to reflect this, Create a republic with an elected Congress & President for the People by the People.
